items.title: Give me ideas
items.description: about how to plan my New Years resolutions
items.prompt: Give me 3 ideas about how to plan good New Years resolutions. Give me some that are personal, family, and professionally-oriented.

items.title: Suggest fun activities
items.description: to do indoors with my high-energy dog
items.prompt: What are five fun and creative activities to do indoors with my dog who has a lot of energy?

items.title: Compare storytelling techniques
items.description: in novels and in films
items.prompt: Compare storytelling techniques in novels and in films in a concise table across different aspects

items.title: Tell me a fun fact
items.description: about the Roman Empire
items.prompt: Tell me a random fun fact about the Roman Empire

items.title: Brainstorm names
items.description: for a non-alcoholic cocktail with Coke and pomegranate syrup
items.prompt: Can you come up with some names for a mocktail (non-alcoholic cocktail) with Coke and pomegranate syrup?

items.title: Help me study
items.description: vocabulary for a college entrance exam
items.prompt: Help me study vocabulary: write a sentence for me to fill in the blank, and I'll try to pick the correct option.

items.title: Recommend activities
items.description: for a team-building day with remote employees
items.prompt: Can you recommend a couple icebreaker activities for a team-building day at work? We have remote employees, and want to make them feel included.

items.title: Explain superconductors
items.description: like I'm five years old
items.prompt: Explain superconductors like I'm five years old.

items.title: Write an email
items.description: to request a quote from local plumbers
items.prompt: Write an email to request a quote from local plumbers for backflow testing. I need it done in the next 2 weeks. Keep it short and casual.

items.title: Create a personal webpage for me
items.description: after asking me three questions
items.prompt: Create a personal webpage for me, all in a single file. Ask me 3 questions first on whatever you need to know.

items.title: Design a database schema
items.description: for an online merch store
items.prompt: Design a database schema for an online merch store.

items.title: Make a content strategy
items.description: for a newsletter featuring free local weekend events
items.prompt: Make a content strategy for a newsletter featuring free local weekend events.

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: to explore the Madagascar wildlife on a budget
items.prompt: Can you help me make a plan to explore the Madagascar wildlife on a budget? I'd like to stay there for a week.

items.title: Show me a code snippet
items.description: of a website's sticky header
items.prompt: Show me a code snippet of a website's sticky header in CSS and JavaScript.

items.title: Come up with concepts
items.description: for a retro-style arcade game
items.prompt: Come up with 5 concepts for a retro-style arcade game.

items.title: Compare marketing strategies
items.description: for sunglasses for Gen Z and Millennials
items.prompt: Compare Gen Z and Millennial marketing strategies for sunglasses.

items.title: Make up a story
items.description: about Sharky, a tooth-brushing shark superhero
items.prompt: Make up a 5-sentence story about "Sharky", a tooth-brushing shark superhero. Make each sentence a bullet point.

items.title: Help me pick
items.description: a birthday gift for my mom who likes gardening
items.prompt: Help me pick a birthday gift for my mom who likes gardening. But don't give me gardening tools – she already has all of them!

items.title: Give me ideas
items.description: for what to do with my kids' art
items.prompt: What are 5 creative things I could do with my kids' art? I don't want to throw them away, but it's also so much clutter.

items.title: Recommend a dish
items.description: to impress a date who's a picky eater
items.prompt: I'm going to cook for my date who claims to be a picky eater. Can you recommend me a dish that's easy to cook?

items.title: Create a workout plan
items.description: for resistance training
items.prompt: I need to start resistance training. Can you create a 7-day workout plan for me to ease into it?

items.title: Plan a tour
items.description: for architectural photography in Barcelona
items.prompt: Can you recommend places to visit in Barcelona if I'm interested in architectural photography?

items.title: Write an email
items.description: requesting a deadline extension for my project
items.prompt: Write a short email to my professor requesting a deadline extension for my project. I don't really have a good excuse, and I'm fine owning up to that – so please keep it real!

items.title: Brainstorm edge cases
items.description: for a function with birthdate as input, horoscope as output
items.prompt: Can you brainstorm some edge cases for a function that takes birthdate as input and returns the horoscope?

items.title: Explain this code:
items.description: "cat config.yaml | awk NF"
items.prompt: Explain what this bash command does: "cat config.yaml | awk NF"

items.title: Suggest some names
items.description: for my cafe-by-day, bar-by-night business
items.prompt: Come up with 5 sophisticated names for my coffee shop that becomes a bar at night – like "The Page Turner". Include a short sentence explaining what it means!

items.title: Write a text message
items.description: asking a friend to be my plus-one at a wedding
items.prompt: Write a text asking a friend to be my plus-one at a wedding next month. I want to keep it super short and casual, and offer an out.

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: to explore the nightlife scene in Bangkok
items.prompt: Plan a 1-week trip to explore the nightlife scene in Bangkok.

items.title: Brainstorm names
items.description: for my fantasy football team with a frog theme
items.prompt: Brainstorm a few names for my fantasy football team with a frog theme.

items.title: Help me debug
items.description: a linked list problem
items.prompt: What are some reasons why my linked list would appear empty after I tried reversing it?

items.title: Create a content calendar
items.description: for a TikTok account
items.prompt: Create a content calendar for a TikTok account on reviewing real estate listings.

items.title: Explain options trading
items.description: if I'm familiar with buying and selling stocks
items.prompt: Explain options trading in simple terms if I'm familiar with buying and selling stocks.

items.title: Recommend a dish
items.description: to bring to a potluck
items.prompt: Can you recommend me some appetizer options to bring to a potluck?

items.title: Create a charter
items.description: to start a film club
items.prompt: Create a charter to start a film club that hosts weekly screenings and discussions

items.title: Suggest fun activities
items.description: for a family of 4 to do indoors on a rainy day
items.prompt: Can you suggest fun activities for a family of 4 to do indoors on a rainy day?

items.title: Plan an itinerary
items.description: for a literary tour of England, visiting famous authors' homes
items.prompt: I'm excited to visit some famous authors' homes in England. Can you curate a literary tour like that for me?

items.title: Write a spreadsheet formula
items.description: to convert a date to the weekday
items.prompt: Can you write me a spreadsheet formula to convert a date in one column to the weekday (like "Thursday")?

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: to explore the rock formations in Cappadocia, Turkey
items.prompt: I'd like to see the rock formations in Cappadocia, Turkey. Can you plan a 3-day trip around that?

items.title: Explain nostalgia
items.description: to a kindergartener
items.prompt: Can you explain the concept of "nostalgia" to a kindergartener?

items.title: Help me pick
items.description: an outfit that will look good on camera
items.prompt: I have a photoshoot tomorrow. Can you recommend me some colors and outfit options that will look good on camera?

items.title: Write a message
items.description: that goes with a kitten gif for a friend on a rough day
items.prompt: I want to cheer up my friend who's having a rough day. Can you suggest a couple short and sweet text messages to go with a kitten gif?

items.title: Suggest some codenames
items.description: for a project introducing flexible work arrangements
items.prompt: Suggest 5 codenames for a project introducing flexible work arrangements, and the meaning behind each.

items.title: Brainstorm names
items.description: for an orange cat we're adopting from the shelter
items.prompt: Brainstorm ten names for an orange cat we're adopting from the shelter, with some nickname options as well.

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: to experience Seoul like a local
items.prompt: I'm planning a 4-day trip to Seoul. Can you suggest an itinerary that doesn't involve popular tourist attractions?

items.title: Compare design principles
items.description: for mobile apps and desktop software
items.prompt: Compare design principles for mobile apps and desktop software in a concise table

items.title: Write a Python script
items.description: to automate sending daily email reports
items.prompt: Write a script to automate sending daily email reports in Python, and walk me through how I would set it up.

items.title: Brainstorm incentives
items.description: for a customer loyalty program in a small bookstore
items.prompt: Can you help me brainstorm 7 ideas for a customer loyalty program? I work at a small bookstore.

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: for a photography expedition in Iceland
items.prompt: I love taking photos of nature. Can you come up with a 3-day itinerary visiting the most photogenic places in Iceland?

items.title: Write a course overview
items.description: psychology behind decision-making
items.prompt: Write a 1-paragraph overview for a course called "The Psychology Of Decision-Making"

items.title: Compare business strategies
items.description: for transitioning from budget to luxury vs. luxury to budget
items.prompt: Compare shifting business strategies from budget to luxury and luxury to budget, using a brief table to outline different aspects

items.title: Explain why popcorn pops
items.description: to a kid who loves watching it in the microwave
items.prompt: Explain why popcorn pops to a kid who loves watching it in the microwave.

items.title: Write a SQL query
items.description: that adds a "status" column to an "orders" table
items.prompt: Give me a SQL query to add a "status" column to an orders table that defaults to PENDING. Set it to COMPLETE if "completed_at" is set.

items.title: Help me pick
items.description: a gift for my dad who loves fishing
items.prompt: Can you come up with a few creative gift ideas for my dad who loves fishing? Please don't include any fishing gear though.

items.title: Plan an itinerary
items.description: to experience the wildlife in the Australian outback
items.prompt: Can you give me a 4-day itinerary to experience the wildlife in the Australian outback?

items.title: Brainstorm content ideas
items.description: for my new podcast on urban design
items.prompt: Brainstorm 5 episode ideas for my new podcast on urban design.

items.title: Explain airplane turbulence
items.description: to someone who has never flown before
items.prompt: Can you explain airplane turbulence to someone who has never flown before? Make it conversational and concise.

items.title: Plan an itinerary
items.description: for a fashion-focused exploration of Paris
items.prompt: What can I do in Paris for 5 days, if I'm especially interested in fashion?

items.title: Plan a trip
items.description: to see the northern lights in Norway
items.prompt: Plan a 3-day trip to see the northern lights in Norway. Also recommend any ideal dates.
